nodes.text: The Raider was the GS-100 salvage ship that belonged to the Twi'lek scavenger Ratch.
This ship had nose art of a Tusken Raider with Aurebesh lettering meaning "Raider" on both sides.

During the Clone Wars, after the battle of the Sullust system, the Raider was searching for valuable items in the aftermath debris. There, they found unconscious Asajj Ventress within her damaged Ginivex-class starfighter and retrieved them into the ship. Though Ratch and his Weequay crew attempted to get ransom for her from her master, they were killed by Ventress. Later, Raider was used by Ventress to return her original home planet Dathomir. The Nightsisters also used this ship to send three of their assassins, Ventress, Karis, and Naa'leth to Count Dooku's palace on Serenno.
